rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
Segment does not contain a question.
This segment reports the date and location of the first infection, a bare fact.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports the date/location of the first infection, not capabilities or preparedness measures.
The segment reports when/where an infection was identified, not prices or economic metrics.
The segment states a fact about a past event, not speculation about future relief.
No direct quotes or attributed statements providing a clear frame.
Factual report of an event (first infection) without explicit framing cues.
